content:
# The Stone Furnace now has 5 coal as fuel, but it still has no ingredients to smelt. 
# I need to gather some iron ore to start the smelting process.

# 1. Let's locate the nearest iron ore resource and move to it for harvesting.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)

# 2. Move to the iron ore resource position to start harvesting.
move_to(iron_ore_position)
